Name: In somno
Short description:
Track list

Description:
Tracks 1, 3 and 5 written by Esko Itälä and 2 and 4 by Anssi Lautjärvi.
Track 3 is a re-recorded song from the Frozen Halls demo.
Track 5 is a re-recorded song from the Gladenfold demo.

Recording information:

Produced at NoiseCamp Studios.
Mastered at You Call This A -studio.
